basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=1 µM), Escherichia coli ML35 (MIC=0.5 µM), Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC=1 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=0.5 µM), Serratia marcescens ATCC 8100 (MIC=4 µM).Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=8 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) (MIC>64 µM), Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC=2 µM), Bacillus megaterium Bm11 (MIC=2 µM).Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=8 µM), Cryptococcus neoformans (MIC=4 µM).
